descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Music and Mind

An introduction to music cognition for undergraduates in music and other students with limited background in music. Readings primarily from secondary sources with some primary sources as well.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Evaluation is based on daily homework, a final project, and class participation.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Siu-Lan Tan, Peter Pfordresher, & Rom Harre, Psychology of Music: From Sound to Significance. Psychology Press. Paperback ISBN-13: 978-0415651165 & ISBN-10: 0415651166. Also available as an ebook.
